glsa.title: libsamplerate: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow vulnerability in libsamplerate might lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Secret Rabbit Code (aka libsamplerate) is a Sample Rate Converter for audio.

description.p: Russell O'Connor reported a buffer overflow in src/src_sinc.c related to low conversion ratios.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to process a specially crafted audio file possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libsamplerate users should upgrade to the latest version:
